meaningInfo: Go ahead and feel your eyeballs moving around in your head. Your eyes aren't just the part on the surface, they're the whole balls in there, attached at the root.
readingMnemonic: You know who has some pretty good <kanji>eyeball</kanji>s? <reading>Gan</reading>dhi (<ja>がん</ja>). Gandhi used his eyes to see the oppression around him and decided to do something about it. But it's all thanks to his eyeballs.
readingInfo: Look at Gandhi’s eyeball with your eyeball. It's pretty remarkable.
